guestbook-new.intro-text: Before you continue your journey, let us know you were here. Write us a few words, a feeling, a question. What does it mean to you to be in an in-between space? This entry is part of the exhibition. Your traces make it real, too.

imprint.concept-content:
Students of the MultiMediaArt (Audio, Film, Producing) Master’s Program 
 and the RAVE Master’s Program 
 Salzburg University of Applied Sciences
imprint.legalInfo-content:
This exhibition is a non-commercial student project within the curriculum of the Salzburg University of Applied Sciences. 
 The respective project leads are responsible for the content of the exhibition and the accompanying information.
imprint.disclaimer-content: Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for external links. The content of linked pages is the sole responsibility of their operators.
imprint.copyright-content: All displayed works and texts are protected by copyright. Any use, reproduction or publication outside the scope of the exhibition requires the consent of the respective copyright holders.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.subtitle: according to Art. 13 GDPR
privacy-policy.responsibility-content:
Responsible for data processing on this website is: 

 Jana Schimak 
 Project lead 
 c/o Salzburg University of Applied Sciences 
 MultiMediaArt / RAVE Master's Program 
 Puch Urstein 1, 5412 Puch bei Hallein 
 Austria
privacy-policy.disclaimer-text: This website is part of a non-commercial student project within the Master’s Program at the Salzburg University of Applied Sciences. The project leads are responsible for the content and data processing. The university is not the data controller.
privacy-policy.hosting-content: The website is hosted by Vercel Inc., 440 N Barranca Ave #4133, Covina, CA 91723, USA. When the site is accessed, Vercel automatically collects the following data:
privacy-policy.hosting-content2: This data is processed to provide technical functionality and ensure system security (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR). No data is merged with other sources. Privacy information by Vercel can be found at:
privacy-policy.hosting-data1: IP address of the requesting device
privacy-policy.guestbook-content: Users can voluntarily leave a name (or pseudonym) and a freely chosen message. This information will be publicly displayed on the website.
privacy-policy.guestbook-condition1: Submission is based on your consent according to Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR.
privacy-policy.guestbook-condition2: No email addresses or further contact information is collected.
privacy-policy.guestbook-condition3: There is no disclosure to third parties.
privacy-policy.guestbook-condition4: Entries can be deleted upon request.
privacy-policy.reach-measurement-content: To measure reach anonymously, a local counter is increased with each page load. No personal data such as IP addresses or timestamps are stored. No tracking or profiling takes place.
privacy-policy.cookies-content: This website does not use cookies, web analytics, or tracking tools. No third-party content is embedded, such as fonts from Google Fonts, YouTube videos, or Vimeo content. No external data is transmitted to third parties via embedded content.
privacy-policy.your-rights-content1: Data subjects have the following rights under the GDPR:
privacy-policy.your-rights-content2: To exercise your rights, please contact the address mentioned above.
privacy-policy.your-rights1: Access to the processed data (Art. 15 GDPR),
privacy-policy.supervisoriy-authority-content:
According to Art. 77 GDPR, you have the right to file a complaint with a data protection authority. For Austria, the competent authority is: 
 Austrian Data Protection Authority 
 Barichgasse 40–42 
 1030 Vienna
